objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#131313'/><stop offset='80%' style='stop-color:#232323'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='diagGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#CE7B12'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#F0A945'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGrad)'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#diagGrad)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='880' cy='200' r='100' fill='#CE7B12' opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='900' cy='240' r='50' fill='#F0A945' opacity='0.2'/><g transform='rotate(-30, 540, 540)'><rect x='200' y='200' width='4' height='100' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/><rect x='800' y='600' width='4' height='100' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/></g><g fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='150' cy='750' r='3'/><circle cx='180' cy='780' r='3'/><circle cx='210' cy='810' r='3'/><circle cx='240' cy='840' r='3'/><circle cx='270' cy='870' r='3'/><circle cx='300' cy='900' r='3'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Space Gray Aluminum Case
• Retina OLED Display
• Dynamic Fire Flower Face
• Water-Resistant Design

product_details.name: Apple Watch - Elegant Fire Flower Face Edition | Premium Smart Timepiece
product_details.description:
• Stunning Fire Flower watch face design with dynamic golden hues
• Premium Space Gray aluminum case with sleek black finish
• High-resolution Retina OLED display for vibrant visuals
• Durable scratch-resistant glass screen
• Comfortable and lightweight black sport band
• Water-resistant design for everyday use
• Digital crown for precise navigation
• Customizable watch face complications
• Perfect blend of style and smart technology
• Compatible with all Apple Watch features and apps

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a tech-focused, modern aesthetic with a geometric, high-contrast layout showcasing a smart wearable product. The left half of the background consists of a dark diagonal gradient transitioning from near-black to charcoal, while the bottom-right triangle displays a rich amber-gold tone, adding dynamic interplay. A prominent image of the product is placed on the right for visual focus. The text layers—`heading`, `subheading`, `tagline`, `subtitle`, `description`, `price`, and `cta`—are well-organized and hierarchically styled using bold mono and display fonts to highlight brand, product name, and premium features. The banner concludes with a strong call-to-action button (`cta_button`) aligned under the pricing info. Decorative circular and bar elements subtly enhance the background. 

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #131313  
- Charcoal: #232323  
- Amber Orange: #F0A945  
- Burnt Orange: #CE7B12  
- Light Gray: #E0E0E0  
- Pure White: #FFFFFF  
- Accent Black (CTA text): #000000
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek smartwatch with a predominantly dark aesthetic, creating a modern and luxurious vibe. The primary color palette includes jet black (#000000) for the strap and casing, and deep charcoal gray (#1A1A1A) for subtle contrast. The watch face features captivating golden-orange light patterns (#D2691E) that radiate like molten reflections, blended seamlessly into the black background to create depth. This fiery burst is complemented by white clock hands (#FFFFFF), making them stand out for clarity. The palette balances dark elegance with vibrant highlights, ideal for banners emphasizing innovation, premium feel, and futuristic design.
